name: react-native-android-speech-recognizer
description: Thin wrapper around Android's SpeechRecognizer API

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test tape-watch -1 -r babel-register src/**/*.spec.js | faucet
scripts.~test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test tape-watch -w -r babel-register src/**/*.spec.js | faucet

author: Daniel Ecer
